specializations: Skin care and hair care applications
product_highlights: Suitable for skin care and hair care
notes: From Nature With Love offers Lactobacillus Ferment as a water-soluble, natural antimicrobial preservative for skin care, hair care, and cosmetic formulations. This probiotic-derived ingredient provides preservation benefits while being microbiome-friendly. Suitable for both DIY formulators and professional brands seeking natural preservation systems. The ingredient offers broad spectrum antimicrobial activity from the lactic acid bacteria family. Popular among natural and clean beauty formulators for its dual role as preservative and microbiome-supporting active.
